meanings.definition: A serum containing antibodies that is used to treat or provide immunity against specific diseases.
meanings.sent1: The doctor administered antiserum to the patient to help fight off the infection.
meanings.sent2: The antiserum was developed to protect people from the dangerous virus.
meanings.sent3: The antiserum walked into the body and said, 'I'm here to save the day!'
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an antiserum, healing the wounds of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The glowing vial of antiserum shimmered with the power to ward off illness.
